mapper.update: update T_CRM_Contacts set Name=#{name},Email=#{email}, Gender=#{gender}, Title=#{title},Position=#{position},Telphone=#{telphone},Description=#{description}, UpdateTime=#{createTime}, Owner=#{owner}, mobile=#{mobile} where ID=#{yID}

NAME generalName FROM T_CRM_Contacts c LEFT JOIN T_Common_Address a ON c.GID = a. OWNER LEFT JOIN T_CRM_Customers tc ON c. OWNER = tc.GID LEFT JOIN T_Auth_Users tau ON tau.GID = tc.
